name: welcomely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is welcome (= that you are pleased to see or support): The shrub will be most welcomely in flower in the depths of winter, when there is little colour around. The popular series welcomely returns next week with a season's worth of new episodes.
More examplesFewer examplesThe governor's speech was welcomely brief and not full of rhetoric. Some of the topics in this book are welcomely familiar. The streets were welcomely free of tourists.
